Translations.Text: avar ceytukeantirunna durvrttikalute durantaphalam avarkk velippetukatanne ceyyum. avar parihasicc avaganicca siksa avare valayam ceyyum

appeal avareatu parayum: "i dinatte abhimukhikarikkentivarumenna karyam ninnal marannirunnapealettanne ninnale namuminn marannirikkunnu. ninnalute tavalam alikkattunna narakattiyan. ninnale sahayikkan arumuntavukayilla

allahuvinre vacanannale ninnal pucchiccutalli. aihika jivitam ninnale vanciccu. atinalaninnane sambhaviccat." inn avare narakattiyil ninn purattucatananuvadikkukayilla. avareat prayascittattin avasyappetukayumilla
atinal allahuvin stuti. avan akasannalute nathanan. bhumiyuteyum nathanan. sarvaleaka sanraksakanum
unnatannalil avanan mahatvam. bhumiyilum aunnatyam avannutanne. ere pratapiyan avan. ativa yuktimanum
i veda pustakattinre avataranam pratapiyum yuktimanumaya allahuvilninnakunnu
akasa bhumikaleyum avaykkitayilullavayeyum yatharthya nisthamayum kalavadhi nirnayiccumallate nam srsticcittilla. ennal satyanisedhikal tannalkku nalkappetta takkitukale appate avaganikkunnavaran

ceadikkuka: allahuve vitt ninnal viliccu prarthiccukeantirikkunnavarepparri ninnal cinticcittuntea? bhumiyil avarentu srsticcuvenn ninnalenikkeannu kaniccu tarika. atalla; akasannalute srstiyil avarkk valla pankumuntea? telivayi itinu mumpulla etenkilum vedamea arivinre valla sesippea untenkil atinnu keantuvarika. ninnal satyavadikalenkil
allahuve vitt, antyanal vare kattirunnalum uttaramekattavayeat prarthikkunnavanekkal valiterriyavanarunt? avarea, ivarute prarthanayepparri tirttum asrad'dharan
